apps.name: Octo Ui2

apps.name: Spot Master 3000
apps.description: This trading mode requires you to import the profile here as well

apps.name: Semi Auto Trading Mode
apps.description: This Trading Mode allows you to prepare trades in advance for multiple pairs and execute by a click

apps.name: Strategy Maker Trading Mode
apps.description: This Trading Mode allows you create powerful strategies without a single line of code. It supports 50 indicators. It costs 250$, includes 1 year of updates and is available through email max@a42.ch. If you are interested, you'll get access to a free demo, before you pay me.
